comparison_summary.headline: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum vs HydraBoost Vitamin C Serum
comparison_summary.summary: Both products are Vitamin C serums. GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is described as suitable for Oily, Combination skin, while HydraBoost Vitamin C Serum in this fictional example is described for Normal, Dry skin.

who_should_choose_which.primary_recommendation: Choose GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum if you have Oily, Combination skin and want a 10% Vitamin C serum that helps brighten skin and fade dark spots.
who_should_choose_which.secondary_recommendation: Choose HydraBoost Vitamin C Serum if you have Normal, Dry skin and prefer this fictional alternative.
